title_en: WRT: Volume Index by Group (3 digit)
title_ms: PBR: Indeks Volum mengikut Kumpulan (3 digit)
description_en: Volume index for wholesale & retail trade subsectors, by MSIC group (3 digit). The table provides a preview of the full dataset using the latest month of data only.
description_ms: Indeks volum bagi subsektor perdagangan borong & runcit, mengikut kumpulan MSIC (3 digit). Jadual memberi pratonton kepada set data penuh dengan menggunakan data bulan terkini sahaja.
methodology_en: Statistics on the wholesale and retail trade subsectors are produced using data collected through the Monthly Survey of Wholesale & Retail Trade. The data covers all establishments registered with relevant regulatory bodies which are engaged in wholesale and retail trade activities, and is reported based on the establishments' profit and loss accounts, financial statements, and other valid supporting documents. For a full description of the methodology, please refer to the [Technical Notes](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/technical-notes/iowrt-technotes).
methodology_ms: Statistik mengenai subsektor perdagangan borong dan runcit dihasilkan menggunakan data yang dikumpul melalui Survei Perdagangan Borong & Runcit Bulanan. Data tersebut meliputi semua pertubuhan yang berdaftar dengan badan-badan kawal selia yang terlibat dalam aktiviti perdagangan borong dan runcit, dan dilaporkan berdasarkan penyata untung dan rugi, penyata kewangan, serta dokumen sokongan sah yang lain. Untuk mendapat perincian metodologi yang penuh, sila merujuk kepada [Nota Teknikal](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/technical-notes/iowrt-technotes).
caveat_en: In cases where proper financial statements for an establishment are incomplete or unavailable, the data is reported based on the best available estimates
caveat_ms: Dalam keadaan di mana akaun kewangan sesebuah pertubuhan itu tidak selesai atau tidak tersedia, data dilaporkan berdasarkan anggaran terbaik.
publication_en: [Wholesale & Retail Trade, Feb 2023](https://open.dosm.gov.my/publications/iowrt_2024-02), the latest edition of the monthly wholesale and retail trade statistics published by DOSM. OpenDOSM also features a [dashboard on wholesale and retail trade](https://open.dosm.gov.my/dashboard/wholesale-retail-trade).
publication_ms: [Perdagangan Borong dan Runcit, Feb 2023](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/publications/iowrt_2024-02), edisi terkini bagi statistik perdagangan borong dan runcit yang diterbitkan oleh DOSM. OpenDOSM sendiri juga memaparkan [papan pemuka khas tentang perdagangan borong dan runcit](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/dashboard/wholesale-retail-trade).

fields.name: series
fields.description_en: [String] Series type, either absolute values ('abs'), year-on-year growth ('growth_yoy') or month-on-month growth ('growth_mom')
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Jenis siri, sama ada nilai mutlak ('abs'), pertumbuhan tahunan ('growth_yoy') atau pertumbuhan bulanan ('growth_mom')

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with DD set to 01 as the data is at monthly frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan DD diberi nilai 01 kerana data berfrekuensi bulanan

fields.name: group
fields.description_en: [String] 3-digit code, to be matched using the 'group' column in the [MSIC Lookup](https://open.dosm.gov.my/data-catalogue/msic). The MSIC lookup table will give you the English and Malay definitions.
fields.description_ms: [Rentetan] Kod 3 digit, yang perlu dipadankan dengan medan 'group' dalam [Jadual MSIC](https://open.dosm.gov.my/ms-MY/data-catalogue/msic). Padanan tersebut akan membolehkan anda mendapat keterangan dalam Bahasa Inggeris dan Bahasa Melayu.

fields.name: volume
fields.description_en: [Float] Quantity of items sold, expressed as an index with base 2015 = 100
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah barang yang dijual, sebagai indeks dengan asas 2015 = 100
